000.title: Hello, World!
000.hint: The initial click_tutorial/cli.py should pass the test.

001.title: Basic Options
001.hint: Look at click_tutorial/hello.py for an example of @click.option

002.title: Basic Arguments
002.hint: Look at click_tutorial/hello.py for an example of @click.argument

003.title: Basic Subcommands
003.hint:
Subcommands are just like regular commands but then are attached to a function decorated with @click.group()
Look at click_tutorial/tutorial_runner.py for an example of subcommands in use.

004.title: Basic Help / Usage Documentation
004.hint: Help / usage documentation is generated from command functions' docstrings and options' help= params.
